It’s the time of celebration, festival of lights, prayers, sweets, a time well spent with family and shopping. Diwali is a five Day Festival and every day you need new dresses to wear and gifts for your relatives, friend. Everyone wants to do their Diwali shopping, lot of exciting offers, cash back offers and so on. Mobile apps play an important role in helping people for your shopping. There are a huge amount of ways and applications you can use to search for stuff on your Smartphone for this Diwali shopping. Mobile apps help you to compare prices, latest prices on your Mobile app. Shopping is so much easier from the last year. Here we suggest you best shopping applications for this Diwali-

Amazon

Amazon is one of the top-notch shopping Mobile App. You can find any product here and enjoy well. Lots of deal and exciting offers. Great Indian festival that will be running from October 25-28. The tagline for these deals is- There are deals, and then there are lighting deals. This app also help you if any product is unavailable simply sign up and you get the notification on your phone.

Snapdeal

On the top is the search bar alongside an essential choice menu, select offers and deals of the day on Snapdeal. This is followed by a list of categories, for example, electronics, fashion and lifestyle. The application works rapidly on 2G data network also, yet it takes time to load the images. On selecting a product, you can view the rating for the standard delivery by the seller, followed by a perspective of different sellers and key features.                                                                                                                                    

Jabong

If anyone wants to do shopping only for clothes, so Jabong is for you. This is followed by various categories including men, women, men, kids, home fashion, designers and Top brands. One cool feature on Jabong is the “Shop the Look” option that takes you to another page altogether within the application featuring all the dress, bags and accessories. The best offer cost shows up in a similar window, demonstrating the discount you can benefit. Tracking the order within an App is easy.

Myntra

This is a heavy application and takes time to load. The home screen is dominated by the offers only, isolated into various heads. The experience of shopping on the application isn’t terrible however regardless we favored the Myntra website.

Flipkart

Flipkart Big Diwali shopping sale will also active between October 25-28, and offering big discounts on Smartphone, headphones, Smart watches and more. Flipkart also offers big exchange offers. At the point when launched on a same network connection, the Flipkart App took considerably longer time to load. One good thing about the Flipkart application is the quick tutorial that pops up when using the application.

Almost all e-commerce apps are so heavy, and take so much mobile storage. So we prefer those ones which take less storage and give you excellent services.
